DOC.brief_summary: Pilot, randomized, parallel, open-label, controlled, clinical study evaluating virological response in plasma and extra-plasmatic compartments, together with the degree and kinetics of immune reconstitution in treatment-naïve patients with CD4 count below 100 cells/mL, when treated with tenofovir and abacavir together with lopinavir or efavirenz.
DOC.brief_title: Immune Reconstitution in naïve HIV Patients With CD4 <100 Cells/mL When Treated With Lopinavir or Efavirenz.
DOC.criteria: HIVinfection Antiretroviralnaive CD4 cell count below 100 cells/mm3 Pregnancy Current opportunistic infection requiring parenteral therapy Current malignancies requiring parenteral chemotherapy Any contraindication to the study drugs
